name: Station Situation
description:
You are 3 guys working at the same petrol station. Your goal is to pay the bills to keep the station alive!

Tips:

- Every character uses a different set of keys to move, check the bottom right for help

- Bills go up with time, get more money each day to keep the shop running

- When you run out of energy you move slower, top up at the Drink Dispenser for a small cost

- You can't always check your stock, only when you're in the stock room/at the shelf

- Only people with the title can do the action (i.e. only the janitor can clean, but he can't restock or scan)

Play solo with 3 characters for real chaos or go with 3 friends for a more coop-friendly experience!

Just remember - Don't get shut down!

///UPDATE///

- Added music/sound effects for actions

- Reworked the purchase of restocking items
